summary: Build a one-page personal profile website highlighting services in digital marketing, website development, SEO, Google Ads, Tag Manager, Meta ads, and local ads.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive single-page personal profile website that presents the user as a professional offering the following services: Digital Marketing, Website Development, SEO, Google Ads, Tag Manager, Meta Ads, and Local Ads.

Implement a clear section structure with user-facing English copy: Hero (name/title + short value statement), About, Services (cards or list for each service), and Contact (simple contact section with placeholders for email/phone/social links).

Apply one cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for a professional digital marketing profile; keep styling consistent across all sections and avoid a blue/purple primary palette.
Add basic on-page SEO elements for a personal profile landing page: meaningful document title, meta description, and accessible semantic headings (one H1, then H2s for sections).
Add generated static images as frontend assets and display them on the page: a profile avatar/illustration and a subtle abstract header background.
Update the Contact section contact method cards to use the user's provided email, phone number, and LinkedIn URL, including correct `mailto:` and `tel:` hrefs.
Update the social icon buttons/links to use the user's provided X, GitHub, and LinkedIn URLs.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a one-page personal profile website (single-page code) showcasing services: Digital Marketing, Website Development, SEO, Google Ads, Tag Manager, Meta Ads, Local Ads.
Update contact/social icons and links to include X, LinkedIn, GitHub, email, and phone with the provided URLs and details.
